name: Tiny Dungeon (IchiSamaFR)
description:
Tiny Dungeon (Not definitive name) is a dungeon turn based prototype.

Inspiration :
- Binding Of Isaac for the dungeon generation.
- Pixel Dungeon for the gameplay.

What's the direction ?
Make a hub to permit buying upgrades for your next adventures.
-> Adding a chief, permit to eat something to get power up for the run.
-> Adding a black-smith, permit to buy some upgrades for your weapons.

I would like to take inspiration from turn base strategy.
-> Adding like Action Points,
